name: No. 6 Bond Smoother Frizz Control Styling Hair Cream
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:A velvety, leave-in styling treatment for up to 72 hours of frizz control, faster blow-dries, and frizz-free air-dries for all hair types..Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Texture:Coily, Curly, Straight, and Wavy.Hair Concerns:- Frizz.Key Benefits:- Up to 72 hours of frizz control.Highlighted Ingredients:- Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate: Patented and proven technology to repair broken bonds for stronger hair..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:No.6 Bond Smoother features patented Olaplex Bond Building Technologyu2122 to strengthen and protect hair from everyday damage and chemical services. It is formulated for all hair types and textures, including colored, chemically treated, and gray hairu2014now in a nothing-left-behind, airless pump.
ingredients: -Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate: Patented and proven technology to repair broken bonds for stronger hair. ..Water (Aqua/Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Isohexadecane, Coco-Caprylate, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Behentrimonium Chloride, Isododecane, Phenyl Trimethicone, Propanediol, Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Fragrance (Parfum), Cetrimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Glyceryl Stearate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Citral, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Disodium EDTA, Linalool, Citronellol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Hydroxycitronellal, Etidronic Acid, Tocopherol, Geraniol, Potassium Sorbate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Phytantriol, Sodium Benzoate, Pseudozyma Epicola/Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil Ferment Extract Filtrate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Citric Acid, Gigartina Stellata Extract, Chondrus Crispus (Carrageenan) Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a very small amount to damp or dry hair from mid-length to ends. .-Comb through and style as desired. .-Start with half a pump for shoulder-length hair. Use more for longer, thicker hair. Less for fine or short hair...Pro tip:.-For extra smoothness and shine, mix a few drops of Olaplex No.7 Bonding Oil (sold separately) with a pea-size amount of No.6 Bond Smoother and apply to damp hair before styling...When to use:.-While No.6 Bond Smoother can be used daily on wet or dry hair, the effects last up to 72 hours. So daily use isnu2019t necessary unless you shampoo every day.

reviews.review_text: As someone who never writes reviews, I felt I must make an exception for this product. I have thick, wavy, long hair that has been used and abused from years of changing my hair colour and heat styling. For most of my life I was only able to grow my hair to a certain length. Just over a year ago I started using this product regularly throughout the week (~2-4 times a week) and for the first time, my hair has grown past its typical length. I cannot say for sure this is due to this product alone and itu2019s also possible my experience is unique to me. But I can say that I have not changed any other variable in my hair routine nor have I reduced the amount of heat damage I inflict on my hair. All in all, I 100% recommend this product if youu2019re on the fence about it. I just ordered my third bottle and praying this stuff sticks around for as long as my hair does.
